item.title: A great cloud of witnesses
item.description: Dear Amy, Apparently we are surrounded by a great cloud of witnesses, and this is a reason to run the race with perseverance. What’s all that about?! Therefore, since we are surrounded by such a great cloud of witnesses, let us throw off everything that hinders and the sin that so easily entangles, and let us run with perseverance the race marked out for us. â€• Hebrews 12:1 It’s important that we understand this, because doesn’t it sound just a little bit creepy?
